[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["2024 年 5 月 22 日 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/rickhanlonii","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Ricky Hanlon"}]]}],"
",["$r","hr",null,{}],"
",["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":"上周我们在内华达州亨德森举办了为期两天的 React Conf 2024 大会，有 700 多名与会者亲临现场，讨论 UI 工程领域的最新进展。这是我们自 2019 年以来首次举办线下会议，我们很高兴能够再次将社区团结在一起。"}]}],"
",["$r","hr",null,{}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在 React Conf 2024 上，我们宣布了 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/blog/2024/04/25/react-19","children":"React 19 RC"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/reactwg/react-native-new-architecture/discussions/189","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Native 新架构 Beta 版"}],"，以及 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/react-compiler","children":"React Compiler"}]," 的实验版本。社区同时登台宣布了 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://remix.run/blog/merging-remix-and-react-router","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Router v7"}],"、Expo Router 中的 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=20765s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"通用服务器组件"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://redwoodjs.com/blog/rsc-now-in-redwoodjs","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"RedwoodJS"}]," 中的 React 服务器组件等等。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["完整的 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"第一天"}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"第二天"}]," 的直播已经可以在线观看了。在这篇文章中，我们将总结活动中的演讲和公告。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"day-1","children":"第一天 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","em",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=973s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"点击这里观看第一天完整直播。"}]}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["第一天由 Meta 的首席技术官 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.threads.net/@boztank","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Andrew “Boz” Bosworth"}]," 发表欢迎致辞，随后由 Meat 的 React 组织负责人 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/sethwebster","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Seth Webster"}]," 以及主持人 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/_darkfadr","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Ashley Narcisse"}]," 进行演讲。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在第一天的主题演讲中，",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/en_JS","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Joe Savona"}]," 分享了我们对 React 的目标和愿景：帮助任何人更加轻松构建卓越的用户体验。",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/potetotes","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Lauren Tan"}]," 随后带来了 React 的现状报告：React 在 2023 年下载量超过 10 亿次，并且有 37% 的新开发者通过 React 学习编程。最后她强调，是 React 社区成就了 React 的今天。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"更多内容，请查看会议随后带来的来自社区的演讲："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=5542s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"原生 React"}],"，来自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/ryanflorence","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Ryan Florence"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=12728s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React 节奏布鲁斯"}],"，来自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/leeerob","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Lee Robinson"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=26815s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"RedwoodJS 现已支持 React 服务器组件"}],"，来自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/selfteachme","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Amy Dutton"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=20765s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"介绍 Expo Router 中的通用 React 服务器组件"}],"，来自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/Baconbrix","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Evan Bacon"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["接下来的主题演讲中，",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/joshcstory","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Josh Story"}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/acdlite","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Andrew Clark"}]," 分享了 React 19 即将推出的新功能，并宣布了 React 19 RC，该版本已准备好用于生产环境测试。你可以在 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/blog/2024/04/25/react-19","children":"React 19 RC"}]," 这篇文章中查看 React 19 的全部功能，也可以查看以下关于新功能深入分析的演讲："]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["

",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=25280s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"使用 React 服务器组件增强表单"}],"，来自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/aurorascharff","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Aurora Walberg Scharff"}]]}],"

Dodds"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["最后，",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/en_JS","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Joe Savona"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/_gsathya","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Sathya Gunasekaran"}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/zmofei","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Mofei Zhang"}]," 宣布 React Compiler 现已 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/29061","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"开源"}],"，并分享了一个实验版本的 React Compiler 供大家尝试。"]}],"

",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","em",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=1720s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"点击这里观看第二天完整直播。"}]}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["第二天由 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/sethwebster","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Seth Webster"}]," 发表欢迎致辞，随后是 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://x.com/Eli_White","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Eli White"}]," 的感谢致辞，以及我们的首席氛围官 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/_darkfadr","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Ashley Narcisse"}]," 的介绍。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在第二天的主题演讲中，",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/cortinico","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Nicola Corti"}]," 分享了 React Native 的现状，包括 2023 年的 7800 万次下载量。他还强调了使用 React Native 的应用，包括了 Meta 内部使用的 2000 多个页面；Facebook 市场中的产品详情页面，该页面每天访问量超过 20 亿次；以及微软 Windows 开始菜单的一些部分，和几乎每个微软 Office 产品的移动和桌面版本中的一些功能。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Nicola 还强调了社区为支持 React Native 所做的所有工作，包括库、框架和多平台。更多内容，请查看来自社区的这些演讲："}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=5798s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Native，不仅仅是移动和桌面应用"}],"，来自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/chris_trag","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Chris Traganos"}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/anisha_malde","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Anisha Malde"}]]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=22525s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"使用 React 进行空间计算"}],"，来自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/thymikee","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Michał Pierzchała"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/cipolleschir","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Riccardo Cipolleschi"}]," 继续第二天的主题演讲，他宣布 React Native 新架构现已进入 Beta 阶段，并准备好在生产环境中使用。他分享了新架构中的新功能和改进，并分享了 React Native 未来的路线图。更多内容，请查看："]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ckOUBiuxVY&t=26569s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"跨平台 React"}],"，来自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/SlyCaptainFlint","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Olga Zinoveva"}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/naman34","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Naman Goel"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在接下来在主题演讲中，Nicola 宣布官方建议所有使用 React Native 创建的新应用都使用 Expo 这样的框架启动。与此同时他还宣布了全新的 React Native 主页和入门文档。可以在 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://reactnative.dev/docs/next/environment-setup","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"React Native docs"}]," 中查看新的入门指南。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["最后，在本次主题演讲的末尾，",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/kadikraman","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Kadi Kraman"}]," 分享了 Expo 的最新功能和改进，以及如何使用 Expo 开始 React Native 开发。"]}],"

"]}],"

",["$r","p",null,{"children":"大会还进行了关于可访问性、错误报告、CSS 等方面的演讲："}],"

",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8TZQ6k4SLE&t=24070s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"实时 React 服务器组件"}],"，来自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/threepointone","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Sunil Pai"}]]}],"

"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"thank-you","children":"致谢 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"感谢所有使 React Conf 2024 成为可能的工作人员、演讲者和参与者。感谢名单太长不能一一列出，但我们想特别感谢一些人。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["感谢 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/barbara_markie","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Barbara Markiewicz"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.callstack.com/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Callstack"}]," 团队和我们的 React 团队开发者倡导者 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/mattcarrollcode","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Matt Carroll"}]," 帮助策划整个活动；感谢 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://zeroslopeevents.com/about","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Sunny Leggett"}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://zeroslopeevents.com","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Zero Slope"}]," 的所有人帮助组织活动。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["感谢 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/_darkfadr","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Ashley Narcisse"}]," 担任我们的主持人和首席氛围官；感谢 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/chantastic","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Michael Chan"}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/jamonholmgren","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Jamon Holmgren"}]," 主持问答环节。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["感谢 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/sethwebster","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Seth Webster"}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://x.com/Eli_White","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Eli White"}]," 每天欢迎我们，并提供结构和内容方面的指导；感谢 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/tomocchino","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Tom Occhino"}]," 在聚会后加入我们，并发表特别讯息。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["感谢 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FxTZL2U-uKg&t=1263s","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Ricky Hanlon"}]," 提供关于演讲的详细反馈，设计幻灯片，以及总体上填补细节方面的空缺。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["感谢 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.callstack.com/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Callstack"}]," 建设大会网站；感谢 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/kadikraman","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Kadi Kraman"}]," 和 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://expo.dev/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Expo"}]," 团队建设大会移动应用。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["感谢所有赞助商使本次活动得以实现：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://remix.run/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Remix"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://developer.amazon.com/apps-and-games?cmp=US_2024_05_3P_React-Conf-2024&ch=prtnr&chlast=prtnr&pub=ref&publast=ref&type=org&typelast=org","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Amazon"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://mui.com/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"MUI"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://sentry.io/for/react/?utm_source=sponsored-conf&utm_medium=sponsored-event&utm_campaign=frontend-fy25q2-evergreen&utm_content=logo-reactconf2024-learnmore","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Sentry"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.jobs.abbott/software","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Abbott"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://expo.dev/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Expo"}],"、",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://redwoodjs.com/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"RedwoodJS"}]," 以及 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://vercel.com","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Vercel"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"感谢音视频团队为我们提供的视觉、舞台和声音；感谢威斯汀酒店为我们提供的住宿。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"感谢所有与社区分享他们的知识和经验的演讲者。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"最后，感谢所有现场以及在线参加大会的每一位。是你们成就了 React 的今天。React 不仅仅是一个库，它更是一个社区，看到大家聚在一起分享和共同学习真是鼓舞人心。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"下次见！"}]]}]]

meta.title: 回顾 React Conf 2024
meta.author: Ricky Hanlon
meta.description: 上周我们在内华达州亨德森举办了为期两天的 React Conf 2024 大会，有 700 多名与会者亲临现场，讨论 UI 工程领域的最新进展。在这篇文章中，我们将总结这次活动的演讲和公告。
